title: Day 315 (John 14-17) - Year 3

description:
SHOW NOTES:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Luke 22:69

- Hebrews 1:3

- Colossians 1:15

- Article: Is C.S. Lewis' "Liar, Lord, or Lunatic" Argument Unsound?

- Genesis 1:2
